"Chat Settings":
"About Shortcut Words

Quickly send frequently used chat phrases by adding them ahead of time in this window, then invoking them with keyboard shortcuts such as Ctrl+F1.

Up to ten shortcuts can be registered per page, meaning up to 50 can be registered in total across all 5 pages."

"Autowords

Add chat phrases to be automatically spoken whenever you do something specific, such as starting a quest or leveling up. You can add up to three phrases for each item by pressing the \"+\" buttons next to them. When you set more than one phrase for the same item, they will be chosen at random each time.
